body_html:
For the convenience of the reviewer, I squashed all commits into a single commit (rebased to my local copy of the master HEAD), added more comments and better tests.
I think I got everything in place and tested everything I can think of (usage of shm, different number of threads/block).

The remaining three open questions from my side are:

  • Should I include my benchmark script as well?
  • Most .Doc(R"doc are empty or omitted. Should I copy the python documentation to REGISTER_OP as well?
  • Is it required to register the gradient on the C++ side as well? If so, where to place this in contrib?
body_text:
For the convenience of the reviewer, I squashed all commits into a single commit (rebased to my local copy of the master HEAD), added more comments and better tests.
I think I got everything in place and tested everything I can think of (usage of shm, different number of threads/block).
The remaining three open questions from my side are:

Should I include my benchmark script as well?
Most .Doc(R"doc are empty or omitted. Should I copy the python documentation to REGISTER_OP as well?
Is it required to register the gradient on the C++ side as well? If so, where to place this in contrib?
body:
For the convenience of the reviewer, I squashed all commits into a single commit (rebased to my local copy of the master HEAD), added more comments and better tests.
I think I got everything in place and tested everything I can think of (usage of shm, different number of threads/block).

The remaining three open questions from my side are:
- Should I include my [benchmark script](https://github.com/PatWie/tensorflow/blob/correlation_layer_shm/tensorflow/contrib/correlation_cost/python/kernel_tests/correlation_cost_op_benchmark.py) as well?
- Most `.Doc(R"doc` are [empty or omitted](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/ops/nn_ops.cc). Should I copy the [python documentation](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/91b163b9bd8dd0f8c2631b4245a67dfd387536a6/tensorflow/contrib/correlation_cost/python/ops/correlation_cost_op.py#L40-L79) to [REGISTER_OP](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/91b163b9bd8dd0f8c2631b4245a67dfd387536a6/tensorflow/contrib/correlation_cost/ops/correlation_cost_op.cc#L89) as well?
- Is it required to register the gradient [on the C++ side as well](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/cc/gradients)? If so, where to place this in contrib?
